title: Alexei Navalny - Wikipedia
snippet: Alexei Anatolyevich Navalny (Russian: Алексей Анатольевич Навальный, IPA: [ɐlʲɪkˈsʲej ɐnɐˈtolʲjɪvʲɪtɕ nɐˈvalʲnɨj]; 4 June 1976 – 16 February 2024) was a Russian opposition leader, anti-corruption activist and political prisoner.

title: Russia of the Future - Wikipedia

title: Aleksey Navalny | Facts, Biography, Poisoning, Death, & Imprisonment | Britannica
snippet: In the early days of Putin’s reign, it seemed that opposition groups might hold some sway in the State Duma, but the unification of pro-Putin parties under the banner of United Russia in 2001 would stifle much dissent.

title: 5 things to know about Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny – POLITICO
snippet: In 2018, he became the leader of opposition party Russia of the Future, but was barred from running for president against Putin that year because of his criminal record. He’s lately been campaigning for politicians running in Russia’s upcoming ...

title: The political opposition in Russia - European Parliament
